audio_file_line_1_1761453764.original_text: When you believe in God, then you can understand that everything happens for a reason.

audio_file_line_1_1761454752.original_text: If you are struggling, that means you coming out of your comfort zone a step closer to your success.

auto_line_1_1761754970.original_text: Whatever you do, returns to you in the form of karma.

auto_line_1_1761758824.original_text: You have to be fast, otherwise you can't catch the thief.

auto_line_1_1761810171.original_text: Always be independent, both financially and mentally.

auto_line_1_1761811156.original_text: Be strong from inside, don't let others to judge you.
